data: The thread 'Re: Design Review Follow-up' discusses a post-design review follow-up communication.
The thread 'Re: Design Review Follow-up' shows that John shared the meeting minutes and outlined the next steps from the design review.
The thread 'Re: Design Review Follow-up' indicates that Sara committed to reviewing the meeting minutes.
The thread 'Re: Design Review Follow-up' indicates that Sara committed to providing feedback on the meeting minutes by Monday.
The thread 'Re: Design Review Follow-up' documents the coordination of action items resulting from the design review meeting.
